player_character.name: HerpADerp
player_character.backstory: Thandor Silverleaf had always been a child of the wilds, his elven heritage binding him to the whispering forests of Elenareth even as his restless spirit yearned beyond their ancient borders. Born to a clan of wardens in the Elvenwood, he was trained from youth in the ways of the ranger—tracking beasts through mist-shrouded glades, reading the stars as easily as elven script, and loosing arrows with the precision of a hunting hawk. Yet discipline chafed against his curious nature. When he was but a stripling of 120 years (barely an adult by elven standards), he abandoned his post after a heated quarrel with his mentor, Maeren, over what Thandor saw as the clan’s rigid isolationism. He wandered southward into the human kingdoms, where he joined a mercenary company to “see the world,” only to find himself complicit in a raid that left a frontier village burned and its people slain. The memory of a child’s scream, echoing through smoke-filled streets, haunts him still. Gu
